Html:
Hello! Please, help me!. I need to make store like this, but genres should not be links, but items of Dropdownlist. When the genre from the dropdownlist is choosen, below should appear albums of that genre. What  should I  change?
Now I have this:

<ul>
<% foreach (string genreName in Model.Genre)
{ %>
<li>
<%: Html.ActionLink(genreName, "Browse", "Store", new { genre = genreName }, null)%>
</li>
<% } %>
</ul>

Thank you beforehand for your answers.
